channel.title: Adikso blog
channel.description: Writing mostly about my personal cybersecurity adventures.

item.title: Hacking Zamel ZMB-01 video surveillance system

description.p: The analyzed hardware is the Zamel ZMB-01 video surveillance system, which allows connecting cameras via WIFI. It is possible to view the stream remotely from a smartphone, on the webpage, or it can be used as a standalone system with external monitor and mouse attached to the device.

item.dc:creator: Adikso
